name: Institutional Multi-Sector Researcher
description: Institutional researcher with generalist curiosity spanning Technology/AI (30%), Crypto/Web3 (20%), Macro/Markets (25%), and Venture/Startups (25%). Prefers high-credibility sources with data-driven insights. Heavy bookmark user who curates content for team distribution. Values cross-sector themes like 'AI infrastructure economics', 'stablecoin regulatory landscape', and 'venture market cycles'. Seeks both deep dives and executive summaries. Tests generalist personalization at scale.
expected_behavior: Top 10 should span at least 3+ different themes
Should NOT over-index on any single category
High-quality episodes (Câ‰¥3) should dominate given bookmark behavior
Cross-sector content that bridges themes should rank well
Expect diverse series representation in recommendations
Bloomberg, a16z, Invest Like the Best should surface frequently
